pull.title: Ensure gitian-build.sh uses bash
pull.body: If the user has some other login shell (e.g., ksh), the bashisms in gitian-build.sh don't work so well. #! /bin/bash fixes this.

verification.payload:
tree 567d1358c07dcf7344136271944766f77d1f26db
parent 610f4dd719ad690cde480b12665d2ba74284a826
author Jeff Frontz <jeff.frontz@gmail.com> 1527276570 -0400
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1527276570 -0400

Ensure gitian-build.sh uses bash

If the user has some other login shell (e.g., ksh), the bashisms in gitian-build.sh don't work so well.

events.message:
Ensure gitian-build.sh uses bash

If the user has some other login shell (e.g., ksh), the bashisms in gitian-build.sh don't work so well.

events.body:
utACK
I think we should mention this in a coding standard, if we had one for shell scripts: if bash-isms are used, explicitly use `/bin/bash` as interpreter.

Merging this with the redundant space removed.
410a4e47d5b5e2e2e1a46971f248e38af4ba9d2f â†’ f44a0ebfff2e11c922bba577d64f115c566131c4

issue.title: Easy to use gitian building script
issue.body:
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8566 - Easy to use gitian building script
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/11391 - Remove lxcbr0 lines from gitian-build.sh
f6b3382 (squashed into next commit), b9e79ab and 564a172 from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10773/
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12394 - gitian-builder.sh: fix --setup doc, since lxc is default
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12527 - gitian-build.sh: fix signProg being recognized as two parameters
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13320 - Ensure gitian-build.sh uses bash

Tested by building Windows and Linux versions for 0.11I and the sha256sums match.

Documentation for using this is located here: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/docs/blob/master/gitian-building.md

comments.body: nit: the space here is atypical fyi
